abstract: Loving yourself and seeing the good in others. 'Screen It' 2013 Winner - Bullying. No Way! Secondary Award
description: Written from a collection of true stories, this film shows a boy of 15 years old delivering a message through an interview that must be heard and understood.  Relationships are how we all connect in life, so make yours positive. Written, directed and edited by Billy Peters, performed by Conor Merrigan-Turner.
